message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be very interested in.  I'm offering it to you for $13,500.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $12,000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product! While $12,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down a little to $11,500.  This reflects the value of the product and also leaves some room for us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  What do you think?
